title: United States Camping Equipment Market 2015-2019 With Jarden, Johnson Outdoors, Oase Outdoors & VF Dominating
text: Reprint DUBLIN , July 17, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/spd8km/camping_equipment) has announced the addition of the "Camping Equipment Market in the US 2015-2019" report to their offering. The camping equipment market in the US to grow at a CAGR of 3.23% over the period 2014-2019. A diverse range of camping gears are available in the market, and they vary in size, insulation, design, material, temperature ratings, and various other parameters. Outdoor aficionados always prefer camping products that are specialized for recreational purposes; however, the demand from a beginner in terms of product specifications is less. The advent of more channels of distribution and strategies to appease all categories of customers have added more variety of camping gear in the market. In the US, there has been an increase in the number of companies specializing in the delivery of camping gear over the last few years. Many organizers of camping programs are adopting online platforms to promote their campsites and for registration. Websites and social media in particular have eased the process considerably. There are now mobile apps that allow consumers to browse the location of caravan parks online. These platforms also enable tourists to purchase camping equipment online. It is essential for camping equipment manufacturers to venture into online retailing because of its growing popularity, apart from selling camping gear through bricks-and-mortar stores. Many retailers have already started marketing through online channels. Consumers that prefer online shopping seek out and enroll in social networking sites that offer attractive camping discounts and coupon codes. They also follow review websites where essential camping gear is reviewed and rated. These platforms can serve as a strong sales channel for vendors to market and sell sleeping bags. 1 of 2
